definition: Magnetic measurements derived from GOCE platform magnetometers
description: This product contains calibrated magnetic measurements derived from GOCE platform magnetometers
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,ms,Timestamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
B_MAG,nT,"[nT] Fluxgate magnetometer, combined MAG, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC,nT,"[nT] Fluxgate magnetometer, combined MAG, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, NEC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
q_SC_NEC, ,"Quaternion, transformation: SC .. NEC",4,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_MTQ_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to magnetorquer, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_XI_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to 2nd order non-linearities, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_NY_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to 3rd order non-linearities, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_BT_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of offsets, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_ST_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of scale factors, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_SA_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to solar array currents, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_BAT_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to battery currents, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_HK_SC,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to housekeeping data, SC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_BLOCK_CORR,nT,"[nT] Block correction for MAG2 and MAG3, MAG frame",6,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FLAG,-,-,1,CDF_UINT4
q_MAG_SC, ,"Quaternion, transformation: combined MAG ... SC",4,CDF_DOUBLE
